\documentclass[preview]{standalone}
\usepackage{amsthm, amsfonts, amsmath, amssymb, mathrsfs, tikz-cd, tikz, ctex, mathtools}
\usepackage{quiver}
\begin{document}

% https://q.uiver.app/#
\begin{tikzcd}
	{\,} & {M_i } && {M_{\varphi(i)}} \\
	&& {Q_i} && {Q_{\varphi(i)}} & {\,}
	\arrow["{m_{\varphi (i),i}}", from=1-2, to=1-4]
	\arrow["{\alpha _i}"', from=1-2, to=2-3]
	\arrow["{\alpha _{\varphi (i)}}", from=1-4, to=2-5]
	\arrow["{\beta_i}", from=2-3, to=1-4]
	\arrow["{q_{\varphi (i),i}}"', from=2-3, to=2-5]
\end{tikzcd}
\end{document}
